frame.name: Grinding
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Grinder</fen> or <fen>Grinding_cause</fen> causes a <fen>Patient</fen> to be broken into smaller pieces. A <fen>Result</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen> can be present.<ex><fex name="Grinder">Bill</fex> <t>ground</t> <fex name="Patient">the coffee beans</fex> <fex name="Result">into a fine powder</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Grinding_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that grinds. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic. <ex> <fex name="Grinding_cause">The wind</fex> <t>ground</t> <fex name="Patient">the leaves</fex> <fex name="Result">into a fine powder</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> with which the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Locus
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Locus</fen> is a description of the active zone of the <fen>Grinder</fen>, where the grinding most saliently takes place. <ex> <fex name="Grinder">Russell</fex> <t>ground</t> <fex name="Patient">the paper cups</fex> <fex name="Locus">under his foot</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Patient
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity which undergoes the change brought about by the <fen>Grinder</fen> or <fen>Grinding_cause</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time for which the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root>This is where the <fen>Patient</fen> might end up, after undergoing the grinding process.</def-root>
